name: Mario Party Fushigi no Korokoro Catcher 2
summary: Mario Party Fushigi no Korokoro Catcher 2 is the Japan-only arcade game sequel to Mario Party Fushigi no Korokoro Catcher based on Mario Party 8. Information is scarce on this sequel, as unlike its predecessor there is no official website or trailer. It is the fifth Mario Party arcade game developed by Capcom and the eighteenth installment overall.
